https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to this creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.description: Stands for Internationalized Resource Identifier which is an internet protocol standard that builds on the URI protocol, extending the set of permitted characters to include Unicode/ISO 10646.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.label: Iri
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.name: IRI

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/abstr._instruction: Enter the abstract or a short description of the creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/abstr.label: Abstract
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/abstr.name: abstract

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho._instruction: Add all parties that contributed to this creative work as authors.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho.description: Creator of a literary or creative work, as well as a dataset publication.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho.label: Author
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/autho.name: author

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/cited._instruction: Add all references this creative work cites.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/cited.label: Cited publication
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/cited.name: citedPublication

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/copyr._instruction: Enter the copyright information of this creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/copyr.description: Exclusive and assignable legal right of an originator to reproduce, publish, sell, or distribute the matter and form of a creative work for a defined time period.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/copyr.label: Copyright
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/copyr.name: copyright

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/creat._instruction: Enter the date on which this creative work was created, formatted as '2023-02-07'.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/creat.label: Creation date
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/creat.name: creationDate

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo._instruction: Add all parties that fulfill the role of a custodian for this creative work (e.g., a corresponding author). Custodians are typically the main contact in case of misconduct, obtain permission from the contributors to publish personal information, and maintain the content and quality of the creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.description: The 'custodian' is a legal person who is responsible for the content and quality of the data, metadata, and/or code of a research product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.label: Custodian
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.name: custodian

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.label: Digital identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.name: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/edito._instruction: Add all persons that edited this creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/edito.label: Editor
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/edito.name: editor

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi._instruction: Add all funding information of this creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi.description: Money provided by a legal person for a particular purpose.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi.label: Funding
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi.name: funding

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar._instruction: Add the publication issue or volume this scholarly article is part of.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.label: Is part of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.name: isPartOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo._instruction: Add all relevant keywords to this creative work either by adding controlled terms or by suggesting new terms.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo.description: Significant word or concept that are representative of something or someone.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo.label: Keyword
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo.name: keyword

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen._instruction: Add the license of this creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.description: Grant by a party to another party as an element of an agreement between those parties that permits to do, use, or own something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.label: License
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.name: license

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/modif._instruction: Enter the date on which this creative work was last modfied, formatted as '2023-02-07'.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/modif.label: Modification date
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/modif.name: modificationDate

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name (or title) of this creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/pagin._instruction: Enter the page range of this scholarly article.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/pagin.label: Pagination
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/pagin.name: pagination

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/publi._instruction: Enter the date on which this creative work was published, formatted as '2023-02-07'.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/publi.label: Publication date
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/publi.name: publicationDate

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/publi._instruction: Add the party (private or commercial) that published this creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/publi.label: Publisher
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/publi.name: publisher

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this creative work.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionIdentifier
